title: Electrochemistry
brief_description: The following phenomena are studied in this film: the electrolytic decomposition of hydrogen chloride; the production of an electric current; the functioning of a storage battery; electroplating and the function of the electrodes; electro-refining and the action of preferential discharge; the precipitation of a solvent; the production of aluminium from a molten electrolyte.
